Compatible with iOS 10, 11 and 12

SoftCalc Gives the Opportunity to Choose Smooth and Color options for your Calculator Application!

More to Come in the Next Updates!

See Screenshots below.

No Respring Needed for enabling and disabling the Tweak options.

Configure options from Settings.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!


See larger Screenshots below..

Version 1.0.4 - Added support for iOS 12 and arm64e/A12. Version 1.0.3
- Added the option to Disable the Copy Feature.
- Added the option to Disable the Paste Feature.
- Added the Label to Easily Launch The Calc App from the Preferences Panel.
Version 1.0.1
- As Requested via Mail, added the option to Make the Calculator Application with Sleeker Blue Text and Tints (Implementation of SleekCalculator available on my Repository).
